overview: Basement Videos is proud to present this shocking S.O.V. short, Undone, from the makers of Blown and Desert Man Beast. What would you do if you could face your child's killer? Travis is consumed by grief after his daughter is murdered by a sadistic pedophile known as the Lollipop Killer. When his friend, a police officer, offers to give Travis one night to do what he wants with the sick psychopath both men will learn that some things can never be undone.
tagline: Some things can never be undone...
title: Undone
